title: How can we track DAF growth?
description:
These are the written ideas from the AFP Massachusets Fundraising Day conference held
                        on March 29 2024. The topic on tracking DAF growth was built by those in attendance.

data.content: Keep donor aware of their impact and continue stewardship for future and larger DAFs
Report of DAFs year over year
Provide step by step instructions for DAF gifts
Pull list of donors who have given through DAFS
Thank Donor ASAP with note / email
Develop reports on above data to track trends over time
Promote DAF giving in solicitations
Create communication plan for engaging DAF donors
Develop dashboard to track DAF donation.
Make sure data infrastructure is in place to track DAF organizations (i.e. Constituent Codes)
Collaborate with peer nonprofits or sector wide nonprofits around tracking DAF giving
Research top DAFs by giving and find to 30-50
Research which are giving to orgs like mine; this is target list.
Create DAF DM piece
Identify donors with past DAF giving
Educate them on giving methods and engage them with DAF opportunities
List on website and other ways of giving
Record the daf name not just the donor name when entering
Conceptualize marketing strategy for current and past DAF donors
Connect with fidelity
Make DAF payments easier to make
"Map giving over time visually
Connect with DAF managers ( Fidelity $
Use database to tag gifts that come via DAFs
Analyze and iterate on report to get to the answers you're looking for
Stay apprised on tax laws and changes
Keep good data about which donors give through DAFs
Pull report of all gifts that come in through DAFs across quarters
Make gift team aware of DAF potential and incoming gifts
Ensure we're capturing donor information
Track gifts from DAFs internally
Figure out which banks / foundations those DAFs are coming from
Develop data governance to code DAF
Develop predictive models based key data.
Figure out how to get donor information? This is a big challenge.
Identify DAF donors / donations in past 3-5 years
Set strategy and tactics for growth plan
Pull current and past DAF activity
Code donors with DAFs in database appropriately
Send tax receipt
Add gift type or subtype of DAF
"Find records of these DAFs from last five years-- search for impact reports
Decide which DAFs are most likely to yield success for your org and continue to track.
Identify giving from DAFs from past 3 years
Ensure that DAF gifts are processed and acknowledged correctly
Develop strategy to ask people to increase giving from DAF?
Compare YOY DAF gift counts
Identify donors with DAFs
Just get right in front of it -->Put something on my organization's website that describes the advantages of having a DAF
Flag those individuals for ongoing research
Make sure database has the capacity to do this effectively.
You need a point person or project manager.
Research donors giving capacity
Share DAFs as a giving method during solicitation process
"Build relationships with the DAF managers at fidelity
Find new prospects
"Be aware of company with daf options and how they distribute (check
Recording daf as separate from an org or ind
Solicit daf individuals
Find ways to connect with potential donors
Improve ease of DAF contributions
Identify the average ages of the folks with DAFs
Curate listing of known DAFs
Collect historical stock market trends.
Year over year growth in database
ID donors with DAFs
Educate donors and staff about it
Track monthly DAF gifts and research growth
Ensure that DAF sponsorship gifts are coded correctly
Track and analyze results against initial metrics
Create database of everyone you know who has a DAF.
Create stewardship plan for people with DAFs. Special communication from head of organization or planned giving office?
Pull a list of high capacity donors
Follow up personally to those who received appeal
Evaluate full FY DAf activity following marketing campaign
Measure against past performance
"Research individual prospects giving history using external databases
data.occurences: to find associations with Charitable giving funds /foundations"

data.content: Educate staff about DAF
Develop policy for soft crediting DAF account holders
"Create metrics that will be most able to be measured/useful
Identify donors with the strong potential giving
"Analyze growth of DAFs for each donor based on starting capacity
Screen those donors every 3-6 months to look for new philanthropic gifts
Ask fundraisers to incorporate the following question in their meetings--Do you have a DAF?
Create fundraising database field to tag DAF donations
